name: 1001 Jigsaw Castles And Palaces 2
description:
1001 Jigsaw Castles and Palaces 2 - continuation of the fascinating game in the atmosphere of castles and palaces of medieval Europe. Knightly tournaments, ancient architecture and luxurious royal palaces! Assemble the puzzle pieces and enjoy the views of exquisite parks and gardens, market squares and craft workshops.

As you progress through each level, you can easily adjust the difficulty level to suit you for comfortable play. Make it more difficult and use the hints at any time. Also, handy assembly tools are at your disposal. Save the assembled puzzle at any time! This game is suitable for beginners as well as for real professionals in games of this genre.

In the game you will find castles from all over the world: Hohenzollern Castle in Bavaria, Chambord Castle in France, Ailen Donan Castle in Scotland and many others. Each of these structures is imbued with the spirit of the Middle Ages. Feel like a knight of the Round Table under King Arthur. Immerse yourself in the beauty of blooming Asia!

1001 Puzzle Palaces and Castles 2 has even more amazing places for you to explore! Ancient architecture, colorful landscapes, medieval weapons, and the cuisine of long-forgotten times. All this awaits you in a fascinating game. Get started now and immerse yourself in the history of ancient cities!

- 500 high quality pictures
- sophisticated game mode with easy hints, sorting and a magnifying glass
- individual difficulty settings for each puzzle allow you to play ad infinitum
- function to disable puzzle piece rotation mode
- possibility to save and continue the puzzle at any time
- for those who like excitement there are special tasks and colorful trophies
- pleasant relaxing music
- 2 in 1: a game and a guide to the palaces and castles of the world!
- new installment in the game series
